metadata.title: CVE-2022-38791 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In MariaDB before 10.9.2, compress_write inextra/mariabackup/ds_compress.cc does not release data_mutex upon a streamwrite failure, which allows local users to trigger a deadlock.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
